course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Data Analysis
course.description: Covers various discrete and continuous probability models and their applications in business problems, estimation and testing of hypotheses, simple and multiple linear regression analysis.
course.exclusions: IMBA 5100, ISOM 5520 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: USTyear1
reviews.comment_content:
covering both statistical approaches and practical case;
including 3 assignment + 1 project + 1 final exam;
using Python to analyze financial data;
reviews.comment_teaching:
are  passionate about teaching;
always ready to answer students' questions through emails;
reviews.comment_grading:
fair enough I think;
most of students could get B range or above;
reviews.comment_workload:
not too heavy for students from computer science background or those who are familiar with computer language like Python;
But for those who come from business school or arts school, I think it might be better to take python course before, because it might be challenging at the very beginning.
